item.description:
Want to practice and improve your Arabic? This group is for native and secondary users of all forms of Arabic, literary or spoken of all levels and ages. Anyone who is interested in Arabic, from beginner to native-speaker is welcome! Our goal is to schedule as many events as possible to accomodate the range of proficiencies as well as provide a variety of cultural/linguistic events for our members. New event organizers are always welcome, so if you have an idea for an upcoming event and would like to organize it, please do no hesitate to contact the organizer at sarabeth1342@yahoo.com.
Also please submit an answer to the poll so that the organizers can better schedule meetups that work for as many people as possible. Thanks, and welcome to the Boston Arabic Meetup!
item.name: Boston Area Arabic Language Meetup
